## Establish as Database

```{r Load packages}
library(RSQLite)
library(readr)

```

```{r Establish Connection}

mydata <- read_csv("Datasets/mini_htx.csv")
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = "policedb")
dbWriteTable(con, "policedb", mydata, overwrite = TRUE)

```

```{r Break Connection}

dbDisconnect(con)

```
